name: Decaying Pitfall!
description:
Controls

[Press]W / UP / Space = Jump
[Hold]E / LeftMouseButton = Swing
A / LEFT       = Left
D / RIGHT      = Right

Credits
Art inspired by     Anselm Kiefer
Assets by           James Criss
Scripts by          James Criss
Particle Effects by James Criss
